## interface_ProgressbarContext
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:20

Represents the context for a Progressbar widget.
This interface is used to define the context object that is passed to the Progressbar widget.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: `object`

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:75](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L75)

all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ProgressbarDirectives`](#progressbardirectives)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:71](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L71)

directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`ProgressbarState`](#progressbarstate)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L88)

the state of the widget

## interface_ProgressbarDirectives
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:234

Interface representing directives for a progress bar component.

### Properties

#### ariaDirective

> **ariaDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/progressbar/../../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:239

A directive to be applied to the main container that handles aria attributes.

## interface_ProgressbarProps
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:123

Interface representing the properties for the Progressbar component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:203

If `true`, animates a striped progressbar.
Takes effect only for browsers supporting CSS3 animations, and if `striped` is `true`.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:164

The aria label.

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`value`, `minimum`, `maximum`) => `undefined` \| `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:136

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

###### value

`number`

current value

###### minimum

`number`

minimum value

###### maximum

`number`

maximum value

##### Returns

`undefined` \| `string`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => undefined
```

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/progressbar/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:181

Label of the progress.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:171

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### height

> **height**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:188

Height of the progressbar, can be any valid css height value.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:150

The maximum value.

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:143

The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### striped

> **striped**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:195

If `true`, shows a striped progressbar.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/progressbar/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:176

Global template for the Progressbar.

***

#### type

> **type**: `undefined` \| `BSContextualClass`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:208

Type of the progressbar, following bootstrap types.

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:157

The current value.

##### Default Value

`0`

## interface_ProgressbarState
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:25

Represents the state of a Progressbar component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:112

If `true`, animates a striped progressbar.
Takes effect only for browsers supporting CSS3 animations, and if `striped` is `true`.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:73

The aria label.

`'Progressbar'`

***

The aria value text.

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:80

***

#### finished

> **finished**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:40

> **height**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:97

Height of the progressbar, can be any valid css height value.

`''`

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:59

#### min

> **min**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:52

The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### percentage

> **percentage**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:30

Percentage of completion.

***

#### started

> **started**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:35

`true` if the value is above its minimum value.

***

#### striped

> **striped**: `boolean`

If `true`, shows a striped progressbar.

`false`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/progressbar/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>

Global template for the Progressbar.

***

#### type

> **type**: `undefined` \| `BSContextualClass`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:117

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:66

The current value.

## type alias_ProgressbarWidget
> **ProgressbarWidget**: [`Widget`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/progressbar/../../types#widget)\<[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops), [`ProgressbarState`](#progressbarstate), `object`, [`ProgressbarDirectives`](#progressbardirectives)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.gen.ts:218

Represents a Progressbar widget.

This type defines the structure of a Progressbar widget, including its properties, state, and directives.
